website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable fit and affordable price are benefits of this pair of swim goggles, but they come with a few quirks.
pros: Good value, as you get two pairs of goggles for a low price
Fit is comfortable and secure thanks to the soft silicone around the lenses
Available in several fun color combinations
cons: Nose clips are prone to breakage
Lenses tend to fog up in some conditions, and are somewhat distorted under water

customer_reviews.title: Wear them while cutting onions
customer_reviews.text: My review may not be helpful, as I didn't buy the goggles to use when swimming. I bought them to protect my eyes while cutting onions for dinner. My eyes had grown too sensitive over the years, and I had to give up onions. But I love onions, and then I thought airtight goggles might help. I tried them tonight for the first time, and they worked like a charm. No burning or tearing up at all.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny T. Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Goggles fit well but offer distorted vision underwater. Company sent replacement goggles!
customer_reviews.text: Fit great and don’t fog or leak but lenses are blurry and distorted under water. Out of water sight is perfect and clear. underwater the black tile grout lines on bottom of pool are distorted and squiggle and dance around this can’t be good for the eyes or brain. What a bummer! Because they are so comfortable and offer more peripheral vision due to design but obviously something is way wrong causing significant distortion underwater. EDIT 1/5/19: eversport sent me 2 new goggles to remedy the complaint about distortion above. They are completely different style and colors but at least the company tried to remedy the problem as original goggle not usable due to distortion.
customer_reviews.author: christy g

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic goggles
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his new goggles! He is almost 6 and they fit him perfectly. He has no issues with water leaking in and they are easily adjusted. It was a nice bonus that they come with ear and nose plugs as well. Love the case to hold them too!
customer_reviews.author: Megann Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great set of goggles for kids
customer_reviews.text: These are great goggles. The nose plugs that came with them are a little useless, and the earplugs are too big for my kids' ears, but the goggles themselves (what we were looking for) are great. They don't fog up easily, and they keep water out of the kids' eyes which is exactly what they're supposed to do. They came in little mesh bags to protect them in the pool bag which was also quite nice. Also, they fit both my 11-year-old and 7-year-old very nicely. Neither too big nor too small.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Ziegmont

customer_reviews.title: Best Goggles EVER
customer_reviews.text: Best goggles my all year swimmer has found. We were constantly breaking the much more expensive googles. Either the hole where the nose piece goes would crack or the suction piece would rip on the Speedo and TYR brands. Love love love these! Fit well, don't leak and I have had a pair for 6 months which is a record.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Petras

customer_reviews.title: No leaks or fog issues
customer_reviews.text: I love these goggles! We had been buying the expensive frogger goggles which were fine but seemed to stretch out when different kids wore them. These adjust to different head sizes with ease and don’t leak or fog up. All five of my kids wear them! I came back and bought another 2 pack. Highly recommendable.
customer_reviews.author: BluegrassSunnyFields

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but... is not antifog!
customer_reviews.text: Well I like the design and style of goggles, it didn’t solve the main purpose of being anti fog.My both kids 5 year old and 8 year old were happy about the comfort and fit that the goggles has to give but don’t want to wear it in pool coz that get foggy in seconds.Now they want their old speedo goggles for swimming , seems we have to get back to speedo which is bit pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Soumya S

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: These are a great deal!! Bought these for my 7 and 5 year olds. They fit all head sizes from kids to adults due to how they adjust. Be careful, the lenses can scratch easily but I think that happens to any goggles really. They've taken quite the beating in the last few months and still work great. I like that you can take them apart a few different ways. I'll be buying another pair when swim team starts again this fall.
customer_reviews.author: Mars13

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our 4 and 5 year olds because we were tired of trying to squeeze them over their heads and other goggles leaking. These have been fantastic! The only reason for 4 and not 5 is that the clip gets tangled in my daughters hair frequently resulting in us having to pull it out. I also tried it just to see if it was her (she has very fine hair and mine is thick and I always wear it back) and sure enough I had to yank it out. Even with the tangles, my daughter still prefers these to any other ones.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Lawley

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these! For the price for a two pack, you can't beat it. I've got these a couple times now, a pair for in the car for beach stuff and a pair for at the house for pool stuff. These a great! Love the snap in the back, the kids love how cool they look. We won't buy any other goggles moving forward.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Finstad

customer_reviews.title: Great for long hair
customer_reviews.text: My daughters loved these. They were easy to put on and take off without pulling on their hair. They also worked well while the girls were diving and didn't have any problems with water leaking in.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for adult., good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Package and quality was good. They have extremely great customer support. Since I had small google they replaced it and sent me the right size as soon as possible. The quality of the product is really good. Fits perfect for the adult. I love the product and customer support. Would recommend others...
customer_reviews.author: AMAY SHANBHAG

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality with poor durability
customer_reviews.text: Spend more and get something better. My daughter took it out for the first time for her swimming lesson and she had to constantly take it off and then back on due to fogging. I'm not sure how but the lens picked up extreme amount of scratches on the lens.
customer_reviews.author: Justmom

customer_reviews.title: All parts except the plastic clamp seem to be good quality --the clamp itself is another story
customer_reviews.text: Been an year and we use it for our 5 year old once every week. Today the clamp at the back broke--I was hoping to get more out of this goggle. All parts except the plastic clamp seem to be good quality --the clamp itself is another story.
customer_reviews.author: shopper2010

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by swim instructor
customer_reviews.text: My child is taking swimming lessons and her instructor wanted to her to get some goggles so that she could begin doing more advanced technique. These are the goggles her instructor recommended and we’ve been very happy. The easy to use clip in the back allows for me to put them on her without having to stretch it over her head. The suction has been great. The anti-fog works really well. The straps are easily adjusted but they also stay in place very well. We’ve only had them for one month, so I cannot speak to long-term durability yet. If I have any issues in the long run, I will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Javier C. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: At best, after about 5 stops to drain & reseat ...
customer_reviews.text: These goggles leak and fog-up. I tried about 20 swims with these goggles. Every time they leaked and fogged-up. At best, after about 5 stops to drain & reseat them on my eyes, I could get the leaking to stop. But I found it too frustrating to do this every swim-session. I'm also not a fan of the hard-plastic nose piece on the goggles. This pressed uncomfortably on the bridge of my nose for the duration of wearing the goggles. Additionally, they are described as "Clear Lens"; they are not. The lenses are tinted. I'm not using these anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get them to fit
customer_reviews.text: Just can’t get them to fit right on my children.
customer_reviews.author: MamaJen

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable goggles
customer_reviews.text: I had a very good feeling when purchasing these goggles, and I am so glad I did as my child feels very happy and safe while wearing them during swim lessons. From what I have noticed so far: they have not leaked in any water, the adjustable strap is sturdy, the one click open stays closed with no issues and the lenses do not fog. What I love the most is how wide the lenses result in a better view of the surroundings which is very helpful for all ages. We also like that they come with nice mesh pouches for extra protection during transfer. Overall, best value for a 2 pack product that actually works!
customer_reviews.author: Magika13

customer_reviews.title: Suction and Nose Bridge average
customer_reviews.text: The good thing about this product is that it does provide sun protection with its tint. For the price you get 2 googles which is also a good deal. The issues I encountered for myself with usage over time included the suction not always being the best. The Nose Bridge area would get irritated even with replacing the nose bridge with the bigger alternative (note I also had issues swapping out the nose bridge as it was extremely difficult). Overall I would say they are ok goggles but I am probably going to look for alternatives. It might work for others who dont have big noses where the nose bridge can irritate.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles - fit well, are comfortable and well built.
customer_reviews.text: My two granddaughters live in our pool at times. Every swim season I buy multiple sets of goggles - from less expensive to pricey. They all tend to break over the course of the season. These have lasted the entire season. The lenses are larger than the others we've gotten, and provide UV protection, and are comfortable (they say). They seal so well that they have swam with them without the straps for a period of time. These fit the girls (9 & 11) and their mom equally well. Can't comment on fit for say a 5 y/o. Will definitely get these again for next season.
customer_reviews.author: Gary T.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, but distorted underwater.
customer_reviews.text: 2 stars for comfort. I don't think I've found more comfortable swim goggles! 1 star for replaceable nose bridge and back clip. The nose bridge replacement is epic! The rear clip is quite nice. 1 star for style. These look great, and the tint is good. -1 star for underwater distortion. As another reviewer stated, these create some distortion underwater that is completely absent above. I think a friend of mine who has some vision problems (myopia?) found these to be perfect above and below the water. We've had them for about a month in summer, and I hope to update the review at the end of the season. I'd really like them to last at least two seasons.
customer_reviews.author: undrwater

customer_reviews.title: Best swim goggles ever
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 9 year old for summer camp. She absolutely loves them. They are easy to put on and off, they don't let water in her eyes and she can do it all herself, no more fighting with the straps to adjust them to her head. or pulling of her hair. They also are a bargain at $14 for two pairs. I would highly recommend these goggles, best I've ever purchased. UPDATE: 1 month later and the snap on the back broke on one pair. This is probably why they sell them in pairs, lol. Still a bargain for the price but I will look for stronger more durable goggles on my next purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mazz

customer_reviews.title: Fit great and easy to wear
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year daughter really likes these goggles. They are easy to adjust and don't slip around or loosen up like some other goggles she has tried on. Since she is on a swimming team, she uses the goggles a lot and I'm glad she found a pair she likes to wear. She also likes the case they came in and the twist latch for opening and closing the case. This way they don't get scratched up going to and from the pool for swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Mars Girl

customer_reviews.title: Goggles lenses scratch too easily.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these goggles because I really liked the ability to put them on and off with the attach/release button in the back of the straps. Makes it so much easier, especially when one has wet hair from swimming. But after just using the goggles twice in a swimming pool, both lenses were significantly scratched. These scratches do affect the ability to see underwater. My kid's goggles get much more rough treatment and do not have any significant scratches. Because of how quickly and easily these goggles get scratched, I would not recommend them. I don't see them lasting more than one summer before they become useless.
customer_reviews.author: Calpatch

customer_reviews.title: Terrible view underwater!
customer_reviews.text: It’s not an anti-fog goggle. It’s terrible to see underwater. Don’t waste your time! First day use was clear view but second day was really terrible. I returned already and I bought Firesara Swim Goggles. I am happy with Firesara. It’s really clear to see underwater.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: *Update* After having this for a month they have ripped. They have been keep in the bag and out of the sun. My daughter put on and they popped right off . Finally found goggles that's fit my daughter who's 3. She has a small head and everything to lose around her eyes. There fit perfectly ! I like the clip on the back easy to put on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Strange warping effect while under water
customer_reviews.text: Rated these goggles 5/5 for suction, comfort, and for sun protection. However 3/5 overall due a strange warping effect that occurred while submerged. My son and I exchanged the goggles to assure it was not an anomaly. Both goggles created a blurring effect while underwater but not above water. This was not due to the water being blurry. We were in Grand Cayman and the water was crystal clear and this effect did not occur with either of our other two (full faced) masks. I suspect it may have something to do with the shape of the lens itself.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: I liked them a lot in the beginning
customer_reviews.text: I thought I found the perfect goggles for my daily swimming. They worked great the first two weeks or so. I followed all the instructions, I put them back in the packaging to avoid scratches or bending, avoid wiping or rubbing the inside, washing with clean water after use. I didn't mind the marks around the eyes either. But now, they don't stay put anymore, I keep getting water on my eyes when I only swam 10 yards and they make me stop halfway. The goggles fog all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeny Teheran

customer_reviews.title: Less tears, more swimming!
customer_reviews.text: These goggles are great. With two pairs, I am able to adjust one pair to fit each kid. When its time to swim they snap them on and go. They are so easy to adjust my 6 yr old does it himself. Theres no hair pulling because of the clip on back. Its cuts down on their complaining. Now, they just complain about the battery acid, also know as sunblock. I dose them with before entering the pool.
customer_reviews.author: teamweber

customer_reviews.title: Way better fit than any kids goggles we've had
customer_reviews.text: I usually wait to review things after several days. However, these googles were immediately better than everything we've owned. My wife was most impressed and she has seen plenty of goggles in her day as a past life guard and swimming instructor. My daughter is 4 and hasnt had a pair that doesn't leak water and stay suctioned without causing uncomfortable pressure spots. She put them on and says: "dad, they dont hurt!" Needless to say im super happy with these goggles. One pair for her and another for my son in a year or two
customer_reviews.author: Skylar Steel

customer_reviews.title: Good goggles, but not great
customer_reviews.text: As someone who had basically stuck to Speedo goggles my whole life, I decided to try out these goggles considering its excellent reviews. They fit quite well and come with a lot of adjustability with swappable nose bridge pieces. Having swam with these a good number of times, they're not bad. The suction is definitely strong and comfort is reasonable. The slight annoyances is the tint is very strong and gives everything a blue hue, which I had not experienced on other goggles before.
customer_reviews.author: Al W.

customer_reviews.title: the best we have found
customer_reviews.text: We have been through A LOT of goggles and these are by far, the best we have found. The clasp is in the back with the adjustable straps on both sides of the clasp, making them very easy to adjust and remove. My daughter used these for the swim season and she loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie S.

customer_reviews.title: Good Goggles.
customer_reviews.text: These goggles are very attractive. I purchased the orange and blue. I have two kids and found the 2 pack convenient. I prefer the clasp in the back that this style offers, over the “pull over” goggle style that other manufacturers offer, since my kids complain that the pull over style pulls their hair. The goggles haven’t gotten heavy use but so far so good. It comes with 2 nose bridge sizes. It is fitted with the smaller one. The eyes are rather large but my petite 4 1/2 and 7 year olds like it. They also come with a carry case and 2 sets of ear plugs.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: It's NOT an anti-fog goggle.
customer_reviews.text: I and my wife bought this recently and used few times. The goggle is almost impossible to see in pool, due to too much fog on goggle. I have rubbed the goggle and washed with water only, but it doesn't help at all. I would like to hear from other customers if they are sharing any similar experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easily scratched
customer_reviews.text: We put down face down for one second and was largely scratched in the center of the goggles. I like the fit and I bought this brand before so thought if I was extra careful this time. But it happened anyways, so think its this particular brand. All of our other goggles (motoeye and speedo are fine) Will not purchase this brand again or purchase one with anti-fog coating on outside. Nothing is more blurry than easily scratched lenses.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: They do the job for the long swim season.
customer_reviews.text: They do the job for the long swim season. I have a 10 yr old that swims year round and goes through a pair or two of goggles a year. I bought these in Nov. 2018, and will be getting a back up pair Oct. 2019. One pair had the clip break, and we are using the back up pair. But really for a kid that does both summer and indoor winter swim, leaves goggles and caps everywhere, this is a great inexpensive option. They get the job done for competitive swim and its not the end of the world if they get lost or broken. Plus you always have a back up.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly and Steve

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not the quality I was expecting. These do fog up, and the mirrored lenses make it very hard to see anything other than your own eyeball. There is a cheap plastic release clip on the back of these that doesn’t look like it will hold up to the test of time. Neither of my children were impressed with these, and they didn’t use them for longer than 5 minutes without realizing they didn’t stand up to what they promised.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: Clip broke quick
customer_reviews.text: These googles came highly recommended and I was excited to get them for my daughter. I love the fact they clip in the back so it doesn’t tug on her hair! We’ve been super happy with them other than less than a month of having them both pairs of goggles have broke. The clip in the back doesn’t stay clipped together and it keeps coming undone. I don’t know if I received a defective pair or not. Love the idea of them, they fit well but the clip didn’t last long on either of ours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my kids.
customer_reviews.text: These work great for my kids to swim under water. I love the snap closure on the back much easier to put on and take off. Adjusting them is also so much easier than traditional goggles. I thought both pairs were mirrored like sunglasses but unfortunately on the black pair has that. The blue pair is simply clear. I use these for my kids ages 4, 7 and 9 and I have used them as well. So great for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Disneymama2019

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the snap in the back!
customer_reviews.text: These are soooooooo great compared to the ones that you pull over your head. I have a 6 and 7 yr old and it was a pain trying to get those other kinds on their heads! These fit great! I can even wear them. An adult male might need some bigger ones around the eyes but these should for an adult female and probably a lot of males. Great price and we've used these for 2 summers and they have held up well!
customer_reviews.author: Mitzi

customer_reviews.title: Just get the googles.
customer_reviews.text: Just reviewed my package of the 2 pack goggles, 2pack ear plugs and 2 nose guards. The googles seem fine. Im crossing my fingers the ear plugs work when we go to the water park. But the nose guard is horrible. Doesn’t like fit my adult nose at all and I don’t have that big of a nose, and barely fit my son’s ten year old nose and the comfort is even more horrible. If it does fit someone out there the plastic would hurt you and you child. Also if your selling a 2 pack deal why wouldn’t you send two carry cases? Two goggles can barely fit in one case.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Punch

customer_reviews.title: Fits great but quality is questionable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 6 year old son. He used Aegend goggles and these looked very similar. They fit great, very comfortable and no leaking but after one use the mirror coating is peeling off. Also they get scraped super easy, he just gently put it next to the pool and one side is scratched..very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Majky

customer_reviews.title: Great for the kiddos
customer_reviews.text: After trying multiple brands with my 3 year old last year, we found these. She loves them and they are the only ones that she will wear. I'm glad it was a 2 pack to start because other kids are always borrowing her second pair. We've lent them out so much that this was my second purchase to give them to friends. Several other moms asked the brand and where I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Bonz137

customer_reviews.title: It is not worth for money. it only protects from sun, not water.
customer_reviews.text: i was looking for swim goggles with sun protection on eye surroundings, because we can't apply sun protection cream in nearby eyes. i ordered this item, it was nicely packed and got it in two days. my kids wear this google next day for the swimming practice and they liked the google before jumping into the water. after some time they start complaining about water keep on coming to their eyes. swim googles are mainly meant for protecting eyes from the water.but, this item is not working as expected.
customer_reviews.author: prasad M.

customer_reviews.title: Thesse googles fit nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought these googles for me and my husband to use for our vacation in Cancun. Unfortunately, my husband lost his googles the first time he wore them. He had them in his pocket and it must have fallen out at the resort. It was a great pair of googles and I was looking forward to him wearing them more than one time. I am ordering another pair to replace the ones he lost. I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Economical and practical pair of goggles. Not for competitive swimming
customer_reviews.text: Can’t test sun protection component so no comment on that These are what you’d expect from a cheaper pair of goggles. Works as intended but as a former competive swimmer id prefer something tighter and won’t fly off if I push off too hard. However I only got these so I could teach my gf how to swim so there is no need to dive through or push off the wall fast and therefore these goggles will stay on. So far they’ve held up for six months, hasn’t fogged up yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: When I received these, I was so excited! The button is a game changer compared to regular swim goggles. However, my hair kept getting caught in it and it was extremely painful! The straps rubbed against the back of my ears. Then I noticed after my 1st swim, that there was scratches on the inside of the lens. They also kept fogging up. Needless to say, I returned them!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Best Goggles Yet!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2. Holstein who love the water and we’ve gone through several pairs of goggles. All to end useless or up dry rotted by summers end. These however, are fantastic. Fully adjustable to fit any size head and the snap on/off feature leaves mom with free time bc once they’re adjusted-they just snap them on! Adjustments stays and they work great!
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't someone  invent these sooner?
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use with my students. My son and I give private swim lessons and a lot of little kids will not put their head under water because then don't like water in their eyes. It's hard to help young children put goggles on without pulling their hair with those nasty rubber straps. These goggles are perfect. The child can hold them on their face (or not) while the adult connects the snap in the back. Easy, peasy. We have had students go from sitting on the steps refusing to put their face in the water to constantly swimming underwater with their parents practically having to drag them out of the pool. LOVE these goggles.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Hassell

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles at a great price
customer_reviews.text: These came fast, good quality and as advertised. They fit both my 7 and 4yr old well. They were easy to adjust and stayed adjusted and snug. They are really easy for even my 4yr old to put on and take off. Neither kid had any leakage of water into the goggle. They both like that you have a bigger field of vision than you have with the smaller, round goggles. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Ib4m2es

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, easy to adjust, seal well, good for our 5-40 year olds
customer_reviews.text: Great goggles so far (we’ve used them ten times or so over a month). Love the clip on the back for the kids, these seal well (better than the goggles with harder plastic rims), and the soft plastic is gentle around the kids’ eyes. The goggles are also wide, so we get a wide view of the pool. These fit my five-year-old nicely as well and both my husband and me with easy adjusting. My two-year-old also “wears” these but doesn’t put her face in the water, so it’s hard to know if they seal well around her little head.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Distorted view under water
customer_reviews.text: These fit my 6 and 8 year olds well. They are anti fog. However my oldest daughter says that she can’t use them at swim meets because when she’s under water the lenses distort the view and she can’t see any thing clearly she until she’s almost up on the wall. She’s even hit her head a couple of times because she couldn’t see the wall coming up.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic fit and ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Love these goggles. I just had to order two more because the kids fight over who gets to wear them. Very comfortable, easy to adjust and the snap on the back is pure genius. No more ripping the kids hair out when putting the goggles on and off. The price is fantastic for such great goggles. Don’t waste your money buying cheap ones from the store. These are 100x better.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: On our 8th pair - they are great
customer_reviews.text: Just bought the 8th pair of goggles. My boys are rough on these and I love how the clips hold up to their abuse. I always have extra goggles around our pool, ‘cause it seems like kids these days can’t swim without them like we did as kids (face-palm). All the guests love these, so I will continue replacing them with the same brand.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Pieterse

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for these as I love the idea of clipping and adjusting in the back. However, the nose bridge that came on them were too big for my kids faces. I've spent over an hour trying to get the smaller nose bridge on and can only get 2 out of the 4 pieces back in. Maybe it's user error but it shouldn't be this hard to adjust them.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria I

customer_reviews.title: Goggles are nice and easy to put on and off'
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Goggles cause they say you should protect your eye's and face' - so I got the Goggles cause of the Virus' that's sticking around now... they are easy to put on and take off , they don't cloud up and fit tight to the face. an they block out the UV rays as well to. I plan on putting them on when the need to comes about.
customer_reviews.author: itsme24u2

customer_reviews.title: Love These
customer_reviews.text: I love these goggles. I bought them for my 8 and 5 year old, but everyone can wear them. I'm 32 and they fit me fine. I like that they have a bigger lens. I thought the blue and pink lenses would be tough to get used too, but they actually make my vision clearer underwater. The back strap is a huge selling point. My 5 year old can snap them on herself which is a big Mom win! I would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: laurajane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Hello Everyone, We purchased these for our boys to use in the pool this summer. Pros- The clasp in the back makes it easy to put on and take off. They fit my 3yr old son and me just fine. Cons- The black are sort of difficult to see out of in the evening because they are to dark. Overall love the product and recommend purchase
customer_reviews.author: Sthompson

customer_reviews.title: Blurry under water.
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning due to blurred vision under water. My pool is clear as you can see through when looking from outside. I’m looking for a replacement to my beloved YTR goggles. This failed to perform. The promise don’t HD view underwater did not deliver. But I gave 3 stars for comfort, suction power, and great shipping. However, wearing this is like closing your eyes when swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Bejeweled

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not perfect, but great for the price. They don't feel cheap. The buckle is a nice feature. Biggest problem was with the tinted lenses - they are tinted on both sides so they reflect on the inside which my kids thought was weird because they could see their eyes. Other than that these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Smith

customer_reviews.title: My kids' favorites, but they break & fall apart
customer_reviews.text: The comfort and lack of leaking is excellent, but they fall apart quickly. I've been replacing them, while keeping old ones to use for parts. I keep them in hard cases between use and my kids take good care of them, but the straps break, plastic clip breaks, and parts dissemble. I'll still continue to buy them since they are comfy and inexpensive, and continue being extra gentle.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A Taylor

customer_reviews.title: These goggles check a lotta boxes
customer_reviews.text: OK, phenomenal. Bought 3 pairs; same goggles can be adjusted to fit any of the kids (5 years old and up) AND the adults. Comfortable, durable, and actually keep water out of your eyes during hours of playing and swimming. Bonus: the UV protection is sufficient for our family members with sensitive eyes (and no more sunlight triggered migraines while out in the pool). Mad impressed.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: So much better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Purchased spur of the moment for a vacation based on the reviews. After using them on several vacations now, these are great. The fit, suction, and feel are better than my more expensive speedo branded ones. Will be buying more next spring. Came with a nice hard case to store them in.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gehrke

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: We used these for the first time this week and they seem to be great! They fit my 9 and 6 year olds, as well as myself. They are comfortable and the wider goggles are much more comfortable around the eye than “normal” goggles. The ease of clipping and in clipping them around the head vs stretching and pulling over wet hair made it a much nicer experience with my kids. Hoping they hold up the test of time as we swim through summer!
customer_reviews.author: DaniP

customer_reviews.title: Ingenious! Great goggles!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best goggles ever. For girls, it's a pain to stretch goggles over hair/ponytails/etc. Gets hair tangled, or it gets caught & rips hair out. These are genius bc you adjust them first, then click then on in the back. So comfortable and have been great the last two weeks in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel N Mandy C

customer_reviews.title: Googles for toddlers to kids to adults!
customer_reviews.text: Swimmingly great. My 5,4, and almost 2 yr old who is a peanut. (Still in 12month clothes and 21 lbs) all fit these goggles. I love the button snap so far good visibility and no fog we’ve already have a few scratches hopefully that doesn’t effect the quality or use of them. I also used them as well as my husband we were impressed with the quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: BareFootMama

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because of how affordable they were (getting 2 pairs for the price of one is a great deal), but these were not the best. After one swim, my best friend and I both had water in the left lens, making them obsolete! So we threw them away and bought some better ones that costed the same price for just one. You get what you pay for, I guess
customer_reviews.author: Terry Allen

customer_reviews.title: Two for the price of one? Sign me up!
customer_reviews.text: Wore a pair for the first time today. Great fit, completely waterproof and seem larger than most goggles, giving a large and clear field of view. Getting two pair makes this a great deal. Love the hard plastic carry cases, as I have broken goggles in my gym bag before.
customer_reviews.author: TIMOTHY P. RUWART

customer_reviews.title: Broke in a day
customer_reviews.text: Bought for kids, tried them on and sent them to camp for a week, Neither came home. Asked kids what happened to them and both said the strap broke and they were thrown out. They are kids and the kids and counselors don't know better. I'm sorry they shouldn't break the day after I get them when they are at camp. Regardless, I tried to explain this to the company and having them tell me to send them back, obviously I can't do that. My money is more valuable than 15 bucks thrown out, I would look for another set of goggles. The bridges to swap them were next to impossible to figure out as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Sporty goggles
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and adjust once you get a hang of it (though I'm still doing it for my kids 6 &7). The lense makes everything look either pink or blue when you wear them. The pink one is actually a mirror when others look at the person wearing them. Not scratch resistant lenses, but overall I think they work well and the kids wear them in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit my younger kids
customer_reviews.text: So I order two sets of these. One for my 8yr old, 6yr old, and 3yr old. They fit my 8yr old great no issues good suctions and loved the look. Now for my 6yr old and 3yr old they were terrible and kept getting water in their eyes. I thought when I found these and reading the reviews they would be prefect for the whole family! Not in our case. I’d say these work better for older children and adults. But other than that they seem like good goggles.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Lewis

customer_reviews.title: best goggles, compare to speedo
customer_reviews.text: Super cool anti fog technology. My kids love these cuz they're so easy to put on and take off and don't need to be readjusted each time. They're comfortable and keep the water out of the eye very well. (the complimentary nose plugs and ear plugs consistently fall out, dont count on those. If they work, it's an added bonus :))
customer_reviews.author: booksonline18

customer_reviews.title: Blurry
customer_reviews.text: These were blurry from the get go. I didn't even realize how clear it could be underwater until I borrowed someone else's goggles. It's not that these were foggy (although they absolutely do fog up), there must be something wrong with the optics.
customer_reviews.author: Susan O

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it! They say these are the best goggles they’ve ever had (and we’ve been buying two or three pair per season for the last few years.) Too early to say how long they’ll last but seem sturdy, comfortable and kids (11 and 8) were able to adjust size by themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Dmom

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 pair of goggles (blue and black mirrored). Tried it on but have not tested in water yet. Comfort and suction are adequate. The clip-on feature makes it easy to wear or take off the goggles. Appearance wise, I think it looks cool because of the mirrored lens. However, it only comes with a swimming goggles bag when the box contains 2 pairs of goggles. It would be nice if a bag comes with each goggles
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: High quality at a low price, comfortable, watertight
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these are the best swim goggles I've ever tried! I can't believe they sell sets of 2 for only about $15. I got some for each member of the family. They even come with a little drawstring bag to hold them, ear plugs, and a spare nose piece for those who need more room. Adult size works for my older kids and the adults.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, low price, fits almost everyone
customer_reviews.text: We've bought these several times and they are AWESOME goggles. They fit a large variety of people (kids to adults), are easy to tighten and loosen, and the clip in the back to take them on and off is AMAZING! Not sure how anyone uses goggles without it 😂
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles, good fit
customer_reviews.text: We love these goggles. They fit our kids well and they secure in the back. No more dragging the strap over your head. The clip in the back works well. These are our favorite goggles. If only I could keep my kids from scratching them up.
customer_reviews.author: S Costill

customer_reviews.title: the most comfortable goggles
customer_reviews.text: When my granddaughter needed to wear goggles for swim lessons, we struggled to find the right pair. We tried different ones with no luck. Then we found these Eversport goggles. Two features stand out- the area around the eyes is wider- she doesn't feel so much pressure from the suction and there is a clip in the back making it so much easier to put on. The strap is wide so the goggles don't slide down. I would definitely recommend these goggles.
customer_reviews.author: K. goldrick

customer_reviews.title: great stuff
customer_reviews.text: i had so many goggles in my life since we always had a pool and i love to swim but these goggles are nothing to compare, the suction is great, no water gets to it, the view is perfect, no cleaning needed, very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: mvmoses

customer_reviews.title: So easy for kids to use, and incredibly comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my kiddos to use. My girls love that they can push the button and not get their hair caught in the goggles. My son loves that he can put these on and off by himself. They also all love the comfort of the goggles and how they can see perfectly while wearing them. We had issues with finding goggles that my son could wear and see in, other eye pieces were too small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best we've ever tried!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my four kids and after using them today for a bit, I am sold! I hopped on to buy another pair for my husband and myself. I rarely write reviews, but I can't help it. You will love these. These goggles are crystal clear and amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A Brower

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three 2 packs of these goggles for my kids. (Had a couple extra for nieces and nephews to use) They all really like them. Ages 6-16 use them and since they’re adjustable, they fit everyone. I believe even a couple adults were using them at one point :) The mega bonus points go to the way they clip in the back, they’re soooo much easier to put in and take off that way instead of squeezing them over your head! They only fogged up for one of my kids..but everyone else never had issues with them fogging :) Would absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JJ85

customer_reviews.title: Good Goggles!
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice goggles. They are easy to adjust and have worked for everyone in our house, from 4 years old to adults. We haven't had any issues with them leaking and they are very clear. 10 out of 10, would order again!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles for the whole family!
customer_reviews.text: We have a family of six (ages 4, 7, 12, 13 and [unspecified parental ages]). Everyone--boys, girls, adults, kids, and too-cool tweenager--loves the goggles. Super comfortable, great suction, and hold a great fit for silly diving games or serious lap swimming. Don't slip and incredibly easy to adjust. After a year living half a block from the beach, we've owned more than a few pairs of swim goggles and I have to say that these are the best.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Galik

customer_reviews.title: Easy to adjust without pulling hair
customer_reviews.text: These are great because its so easy to unclasp the back and adjust. The suction is great, I've had less issue with water getting in than other ones. I've also been able to adjust it to my 2 year olds face when I've had trouble with other goggles before.
customer_reviews.author: LP/SP

customer_reviews.title: Best goggles for kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: These are the best goggles we've ever owned. The rear clasp makes them easier to put on and very comfortable to wear. The lenses make the sun glare disappear and make outside fun even more enjoyable! The fact you get two at such a low price is fantastic if you have multiple children.
customer_reviews.author: PA-TWO-VA

customer_reviews.title: Great price and worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Fits the whole family (3 year old and adults). Love the clips in the back for easy on/off. Doesnt dog up! Only thing is, underwater looks a little distorted, but after a little while your eyes adjust.
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap goggles for the pool
customer_reviews.text: Nothing great and nothing terrible about the goggles, they work to keep the water out of your eyes. You can spend a little more money and likely not get a better product. I am sure they will hold of for the year we expect them to!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles
customer_reviews.text: I have been having a hard time with goggles that don't fog up on me. So far these are awesome! They fit perfect, easy to put on and love the case they come in...really glad I got this and since it is a pack of 2 I have a back up pair if/when I need them! I would for sure recommend these!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Treinen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for kids
customer_reviews.text: My kids have to use goggles because chlorine truly messes with their eyes. We have been through so many where the suction is painful or water seeps in. The straps always get twisted in hair and they just all suck. These have the clasp in the back that make it so much easier! My kids say they are the best they've used
customer_reviews.author: Oreomeg

customer_reviews.title: We love these googles!
customer_reviews.text: These goggles are absolutely great! I purchased these for my children only before, but they lost them, so I had to replace them. I repurchased these and then bought a pair for myself and my mom to use during our vacation. I was pleased with their comfort and especially love the clasp back.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Blurry Under Water
customer_reviews.text: They are functionable, unfortunately visibility is poor. Above the water visibility is fine, below the water it’s blurry, it’s like you are looking through a pair of glasses with the wrong prescription, I had several people try them and we all got the same results, I would go with something that actually functions to see under water as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Misselegance21

customer_reviews.title: Versitile Size
customer_reviews.text: These fit my 7-12 year old children as well as myself. They are the most comfortable goggles I have worn, with a good suction, but do not leave me with raccoon eyes. I probably won't return to my previous habit of purchasing speedos.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Disposition

customer_reviews.title: Why didn’t I know about these sooner!?
customer_reviews.text: These goggles are the greatest invention! I’m not sure why anyone wastes money on anything else! The clip in the back is easy enough to use, my 4 year old can put them on by himself. Suction is great and have had no problems with water leaking in. I want to buy a few more packs just in case we can’t find these because I don’t want to ever have to worry about the hair pulling again.
customer_reviews.author: Emmy

customer_reviews.title: So happy with these
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. They fit me perfectly and they are so clear. Glad I got these instead of mirrored. Great price too. Got them in 48 hours after purchasing. I’ve been swimming laps for 10 years, and these are my best pair ever. I’ve had Speedo, Tyr, etc.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Bought for camp
customer_reviews.text: My son looses goggles all the time. These I just bought for camp since they have the clip on the back I figure they'll be easier for him to get in place on his own. They seem to fit well, communication from the vendor is good and he likes the color.
customer_reviews.author: L. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles
customer_reviews.text: We love these goggles. The kids have been able to swim underwater because they feel comfortable about their eyes not getting wet. They don't get water in them- they are so clear and fit great!!! We haven't had an opportunity to use them in the sun because we've been using them at the indoor pool.
customer_reviews.author: K. WONG

customer_reviews.title: Fogs up, distorted view, dark lenses too dark
customer_reviews.text: Light blue ones seal well, but still fog up. Also, bend of lenses heavily distorts what you see, very dizzying. Dark/black ones are great for sun protection, but are a bit too dark to see much. Dark ones fog up a lot. Overall a nice, cheap product -- but not without issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and very adjustable/universal. They fit my 4 year old and myself
customer_reviews.text: I was upset when these first arrived because they looked HUGE— turns out they fit my 4 and 7 year olds faces just fine with some adjustment of the straps. They are great quality and very easy to adjust— I would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley I.

product_meta.title: EverSport Swim Goggles Pack of 2 Swimming Goggles Anti Fog for Adult Men Women Youth Kids
feature_bullets: ANTI FOG&UV PROTECTION: UV protection and anti-fog coating provide you an excellent swimming experience under water. Anti fog protection can offer you a clear and long distant view under water and UV protection can help protect your eyes from being hurt by UV and bright lights.

GREAT SEAL AND NO LEAK: Flexible silicone frame and gasket can provide customers with maximum comfort as the gaskets have a unique cushioned design that creates a perfect seal around your eyes, ensuring no water in. The adjustable straps can make every child and adult remain dry around eyes and keep hair snag-free.

BROADER AND CLEARER VIEW: With our special-designed lens, you can surely enjoy a much better clarity. You can also see broader and clearer with anti fog protection of our high quality EverSport swimming goggles. PLEASE REMEMBER: this goggles can not be used by people who have over 100 degrees myopia eyes.

ONE BUTTON CLICK: Super easy to adjust! Well-designed clasp makes it easy to put swimming goggles on and off through one press. Even children can stand on their own feet and adjust the strap by themselves.

12 MONTHS WARRANTY: If you came across any problem while using our swimming goggles, please do not hesitate to contact us at any time, we will provide you with excellent after-sale service. And we will try our best to help you with it.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
